constantValues: Relationship between a customer and a partner in which either can be an account or contact.

definitions.description: Relationship between a customer and a partner in which either can be an account or contact.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the customer relationship was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the customer relationship was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: customerRoleId

constantValues: Choose the primary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the second party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.description: Choose the primary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the second party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.name: customerRelationshipId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the customer relationship.

members.description: Unique identifier of the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Select the secondary account or contact involved in the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Select the secondary account or contact involved in the customer relationship.

selectedTypeAttribute.name: idType

constantValues: The type of partner, either Account or Contact.

selectedTypeAttribute.description: The type of partner, either Account or Contact.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: owningBusinessUnit

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the converse relationship of the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the converse relationship of the customer relationship.

members.name: partnerRoleId

constantValues: Choose the secondary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the primary party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.description: Choose the secondary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the primary party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.name: customerRoleDescription

constantValues: Type additional information about the primary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

members.description: Type additional information about the primary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: partnerRoleDescription

constantValues: Type additional information about the secondary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

members.description: Type additional information about the secondary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: owningUser

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who owns the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the customer relationship.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: owningTeam

constantValues: Unique identifier of the team who owns the customer relationship.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the customer relationship.
